model.interfaces

Interface Arena

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ArenaDecorator, ArenaWithLevel, ArenaWithType, BaseArena

    public interface Arena

    • Method Summary

      Trainer startBattle(TrainerPrepared trainer1, TrainerPrepared trainer2)
      Starts a battle between two trainers.

    • Method Detail

      • startBattle

        Trainer startBattle(TrainerPrepared trainer1,
                    TrainerPrepared trainer2)
        Starts a battle between two trainers. The trainers are represented by TrainerPrepared objects, which contain the trainers and their respective Pokemon. The battle continues until one of the trainers has all their Pokemon defeated. preconditions: TP1 != null, TP2 != null
        Parameters:
        TP1 - The first TrainerPrepared object representing the first trainer.
        TP2 - The second TrainerPrepared object representing the second trainer.
        Returns:
        The Trainer object representing the winner of the battle.

      • getName

        java.lang.String getName()
        Method that returns the name of the arena.
        Returns:
        A string with the name of the arena.

      • getDetails

        java.lang.String getDetails()
        Method that returns a string with the details of the arena. The details may be include: - The name of the arena - The credits for the winner - The type of the arena - The difficulty level of the arena
        Returns:
        A string with the details of the arena.

      • getCredditsForWinner

        int getCredditsForWinner()
        Method that returns the credits for the winner of the arena.
        Returns:
        An integer with the credits for winner of the battle.

      • isBusy

        boolean isBusy()

      • setBusy

        void setBusy(boolean busy)

      • getType

        java.lang.String getType()

      • getLevel

        java.lang.String getLevel()
